summary:
### January 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/ctf.buidlguidl.com

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Enhanced the homepage with a description, gameplay instructions, and a flag tracking feature to monitor progress (#10, merged).
  - Updated the main repository README to include setup instructions and additional context for the extension (#15, merged).
  - Implemented a notification system for users when they mint a flag (#9, closed).

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved a critical issue with the stats API that previously caused a 500 error when accessing the stats page (#14, merged).
  - Fixed issues related to user data fetching on the profile page (#5, merged).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on improving user experience through better documentation and interface tweaks.
  - Addressing bugs and enhancing functionality to ensure smoother operation of the platform.

topIssues.title: Extension > Notification when you mint a flag
Extension > Behavior when not matching the require condition from the contract functions

topPRs.title: Update main repo Readme with setup explanation and extra extension info
Open links in new tab in challenge pages
Tweak Readme and generated instance Readme
Homepage tweaks and flag capture tracking
